SqlScript:
Use SUFS

 

declare 
@OrgYear int
,@StudentType int
,@ApplicationType int
,@ApplicationStatus int
 
 
SET @OrgYear = 19
 SET @StudentType = 2
SET @ApplicationType = 2
SET @ApplicationStatus =2
 

 

SELECT 
a.ApplicationStatusID
,a.applicationtypeid 
, a.ApplicationID
, a.OrganizationYearID
,count(distinct(hm.householdmemberid)) students

 

FROM dbo.Application a
INNER JOIN dbo.ApplicationStatus ast
ON a.ApplicationStatusID = ast.ApplicationStatusID 
INNER JOIN dbo.Household  h
ON a.ApplicationID = h.ApplicationID 
INNER JOIN dbo.Householdmember hm
ON h.householdid = hm.householdid 
INNER JOIN dbo.Student st
ON hm.householdmemberid = st.householdmemberid 
Where a.OrganizationYearID = @OrgYear        -- 17=18-19   18=19-20
and st.[StudentTypeID] = isnull(@StudentType,st.studenttypeid)
and a.ApplicationStatusID =  isnull(@ApplicationStatus,a.ApplicationStatusID)  -- 53=Doc attached  2=Awaiting Required Doc
and a.ApplicationTypeID = isnull(@ApplicationType, a.applicationtypeid )
group by 
a.ApplicationStatusID
, a.applicationtypeid 
, a.ApplicationID
, a.OrganizationYearID
Name: FTC-SAS-FindARDApp-RenewalAppRenewalStudent
